title: AI for Social Good – National Youth Challenge
description: A national competition encouraging young innovators to build AI-based solutions that solve real-world social problems. Winners receive national recognition and mentorship.
feature_text: Build AI solutions for social good

title: Women in STEM Excellence Scholarship 2025
description: A scholarship program supporting girls and young women studying science, engineering, and technology. Includes stipend, mentorship, and project funding.

title: UN Youth Changemakers Fellowship
description: A global fellowship by the United Nations that trains young changemakers in leadership, sustainability, and community impact.
feature_text: Become a UN certified youth leader

title: Cybersecurity Explorer Program for Girls
description: A beginner-friendly cybersecurity training designed for girls, covering ethical hacking, cyber hygiene, and network defense.

title: ISRO Space Science Student Program (YUVIKA)
description: A space science training program for young students, featuring hands-on workshops conducted by ISRO scientists.

title: Girls Who Code – Summer Immersion Program 2025
description: A virtual summer program teaching young women computer science, app development, and real-world coding skills.

title: National Arts & Talent Discovery Competition
description: An annual arts competition giving young students a platform to showcase talent in painting, dance, music, and crafts.

title: Microsoft Young Innovators Bootcamp
description: A beginner-friendly tech bootcamp covering cloud computing, AI fundamentals, and hands-on project building with Microsoft tools.

title: Global Youth Entrepreneurship Challenge
description: A global business and startup challenge where young participants solve real-world problems with innovative solutions.

title: Prerna Women Leadership & Mentorship Circle
description: A mentorship program to help girls and women grow in leadership, communication, and personal development.
